title: FARM SECURITY LIGHTS TO DETER PREDATORS AND PEOPLE!!

tasks.task: Installing solar lights on a chicken coop to deter predators.

Insert key into power button.
Charge solar panels in direct sunlight.

Demonstrate quick installation and simple setup.
Show holistic upgrading of a chicken coop with predator protection.
Highlight key features of the solar lights including brightness and durability.
Test the effectiveness of the solar lights at night.

tasks.task: Testing solar lights at night for predator deterrence.
subtasks: Block solar light to observe brightness.
Verify sufficient lumens for deterring predators.
